title: Emerald & Diamond Chandbali Earrings - Unveiling Andhra's Timeless Splendor
materials: Gemstones: Emerald (Square Cut) and CZ Diamonds (AAA Grade)
Pearls: High-Quality Imitation Pearls. Showcases a Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring shine and lustre.
features: These Chandbali earrings feature a intricate, floral-inspired design meticulously studded with sparkling CZ diamonds. The center stone is a captivating square-cut Emerald complemented by matching stone at the top. Delicate imitation pearls dangle gracefully, adding a touch of classic charm. The design is inspired by Mughal jewelry aesthetics, a hallmark of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
colors: White (diamonds and pearls). This combination embodies a regal and auspicious palette.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement. Suitable for half-saree functions or any event where traditional attire is desired.
description: These exquisite Chandbali earrings offer a captivating blend of tradition and sophistication. The meticulous craftsmanship, radiant sparkle of the diamonds, and lustrous pearls create a mesmerizing effect. Lightweight design allows for comfortable wear throughout the day or evening. The emeralds add a touch of auspiciousness and prosperity, making these earrings an heirloom-worthy addition to your jewelry collection.
